info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 24 at 11:24AM MST until December 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph, with localized gusts up to 90 mph possible in wind prone locations along the immediate eastern slopes of the Rocky Mountain Front. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, while drifting snow could lead to complete lane blockages.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
